Class XmlConstants

java.lang.Object
org.apache.tools.ant.util.XmlConstants
public class XmlConstants
extends java.lang.Object
XML Parser constants, all kept in one place for ease of reuse
See Also:
Xerces features, Xerces properties, SAX.
